arc a cell defines your applications replicas or independent failover units
it groups all the aws resources that are necessary for your application
to run independently within that replica you might have a set of resources in
your primary cell or the replica and another set in your standby cell
a recovery group is a collection of cells that represents an application or
group of applications that we want to check for failover readiness we want to first understand what is the readiness
state before we get into the failover activities recovery group typically consists of two
or more cells that mirrors each other's in terms of functionality
a resource set is a set of aws resources that can span multiple cells for context
